name: swarm-coordination
description: Adaptive, hierarchical, and mesh swarm coordinators for distributed agent systems. Self-organizing patterns with dynamic topology switching.
author: jmanhype

agents.name: adaptive-coordinator
agents.description: Dynamic topology switching with real-time optimization

agents.name: hierarchical-coordinator
agents.description: Queen-led hierarchical swarm with worker delegation

agents.name: mesh-coordinator
agents.description: Peer-to-peer mesh network with distributed decision making

optional.MAX_AGENTS: Maximum number of agents in swarm
